End-to-End Demo: Selection, Inspector, and Code Export

Source: vignettes/end-to-end-demo.Rmd
end-to-end-demo.Rmd

This walkthrough demonstrates the redesigned ggplotStudioR workflow:

  1. build a base plot
  2. apply deterministic edit spec steps
  3. preview resulting plots
  4. export additive and patch code

Base plot 

library(ggplot2)
library(ggplotStudioR)

p <- ggplot(mtcars, aes(wt, mpg, colour = factor(cyl))) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(se = FALSE) +
  labs(colour = "Cylinders")

p
#> `geom_smooth()` using method = 'loess' and formula = 'y ~ x'

Deterministic demo journey 

journey_add <- ggplotStudioR:::build_demo_code_journey(
  base_plot_expr = "p",
  plot = p,
  mode = "additive"
)

summary_table <- data.frame(
  step = vapply(journey_add, `[[`, character(1), "step_name"),
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)
knitr::kable(summary_table)
step
Initial state
Edit labels
Style panel + title
Grid + legend cleanup
Layer tuning

Additive export code 

for (step in journey_add) {
  cat("\n### Step ", step$step_number, ": ", step$step_name, "\n\n", sep = "")
  cat("```r\n")
  cat(step$code)
  cat("\n```\n")
}

Step 1: Initial state 

edited_plot <- p
edited_plot <- edited_plot + ggplot2::labs(title = "", subtitle = "", caption = "", x = "", y = "")
edited_plot

Step 2: Edit labels 

edited_plot <- p
edited_plot <- edited_plot + ggplot2::labs(title = "MPG vs Weight", subtitle = "Interactive selection + inspector", caption = "Edited in ggplotStudioR", x = "Weight (1000 lbs)", y = "Miles per gallon")
edited_plot

Step 3: Style panel + title 

edited_plot <- p
edited_plot <- edited_plot + ggplot2::labs(title = "MPG vs Weight", subtitle = "Interactive selection + inspector", caption = "Edited in ggplotStudioR", x = "Weight (1000 lbs)", y = "Miles per gallon")
edited_plot <- edited_plot + ggplot2::theme(
  plot.title = ggplot2::element_text(colour = "#2c3e50", face = "bold"),
  panel.background = ggplot2::element_rect(fill = "#f7f7f7", colour = "#d9d9d9")
)
edited_plot

Step 4: Grid + legend cleanup 

edited_plot <- p
edited_plot <- edited_plot + ggplot2::labs(title = "MPG vs Weight", subtitle = "Interactive selection + inspector", caption = "Edited in ggplotStudioR", x = "Weight (1000 lbs)", y = "Miles per gallon")
edited_plot <- edited_plot + ggplot2::theme(
  plot.title = ggplot2::element_text(colour = "#2c3e50", face = "bold"),
  panel.background = ggplot2::element_rect(fill = "#f7f7f7", colour = "#d9d9d9"),
  panel.grid.major = ggplot2::element_line(colour = "#dddddd"),
  panel.grid.minor = ggplot2::element_blank(),
  legend.title = ggplot2::element_text(face = "bold")
)
edited_plot

Step 5: Layer tuning 

edited_plot <- p
edited_plot <- edited_plot + ggplot2::labs(title = "MPG vs Weight", subtitle = "Interactive selection + inspector", caption = "Edited in ggplotStudioR", x = "Weight (1000 lbs)", y = "Miles per gallon")
edited_plot <- edited_plot + ggplot2::theme(
  plot.title = ggplot2::element_text(colour = "#2c3e50", face = "bold"),
  panel.background = ggplot2::element_rect(fill = "#f7f7f7", colour = "#d9d9d9"),
  panel.grid.major = ggplot2::element_line(colour = "#dddddd"),
  panel.grid.minor = ggplot2::element_blank(),
  legend.title = ggplot2::element_text(face = "bold")
)
edited_plot$layers[[1]]$aes_params$alpha <- 0.8
edited_plot$layers[[1]]$aes_params$size <- 2.8
edited_plot$layers[[2]]$aes_params$linewidth <- 1.1
edited_plot$layers[[2]]$aes_params$linetype <- "dashed"
edited_plot

Patch export code (same final spec) 

final_spec <- journey_add[[length(journey_add)]]$spec
patch_code <- ggplotStudioR:::generate_plot_code("p", final_spec, mode = "patch")
cat(patch_code)
#> p <- p + ggplot2::labs(title = "MPG vs Weight", subtitle = "Interactive selection + inspector", caption = "Edited in ggplotStudioR", x = "Weight (1000 lbs)", y = "Miles per gallon")
#> p <- p + ggplot2::theme(
#>   plot.title = ggplot2::element_text(colour = "#2c3e50", face = "bold"),
#>   panel.background = ggplot2::element_rect(fill = "#f7f7f7", colour = "#d9d9d9"),
#>   panel.grid.major = ggplot2::element_line(colour = "#dddddd"),
#>   panel.grid.minor = ggplot2::element_blank(),
#>   legend.title = ggplot2::element_text(face = "bold")
#> )
#> p$layers[[1]]$aes_params$alpha <- 0.8
#> p$layers[[1]]$aes_params$size <- 2.8
#> p$layers[[2]]$aes_params$linewidth <- 1.1
#> p$layers[[2]]$aes_params$linetype <- "dashed"
#> p

Edited plots per step 

edited_plots <- ggplotStudioR:::build_demo_plot_journey(p)
length(edited_plots)
#> [1] 5
edited_plots[[5]]
#> `geom_smooth()` using method = 'loess' and formula = 'y ~ x'

Interactivity in static docs

Vignettes/pkgdown cannot execute live click handlers. Use launch(p) locally for full canvas selection + inspector editing.

Recorded app walkthrough GIF (live interaction shown as recording).
